entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:30 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
